urlLink Dedicated to Sky Dog urlLink

It's got to lead to some-thing It can't be all up-hill When all you have is nothing There's still your own free will Never-the-less you'll go in circles Another time around the wheel Mean-ing-less is not the answer Such a mess is not so real Should you cry out ever-last-ing Should you try and grab the ring Are these questions so mis-lead-ing That you feel you'll never win With all your heart and soul now Realize a strength with-in A world that's ever-change-ing A new place to begin You must beleive in some-thing Plant a seed and let it sow Give your thought's a place to wonder Give your soul a chance to grow All the beauty that surrounds you And in time these things you'll know Like the space and time before you And for the earth below Lite a candle for true virtue Let the light forever glow Cast away the things that hurt you And in peace you'll always go

Mother nature, Father time Rivers running, running dry Sticks and stones, blood and bones Majestic mountains stand alone Hill's and valley's lay to waste Mother nature sets her pace Stronger faster, storm clouds build Nothing's gonna stop her will Not love of money, want or greed We've come to far, to blind to see And all the while, just out of reach The lie's not answers, of what we preach Won't bring it back, what we let go The natural world, the one we know

We have flying machines A world full of dreams Chains and gold rings Plenty of things To make us happy We've walked on the moon Choose life all to soon Held silver spoons Plenty of things To make us Happy We'll talk all the while See little one's smile Go that extra mile Plenty of things To make us happy We'll stand at the gate Hating the weight Lifted...Far from our shoulders With troubles all gone Greet a new dawn Plenty of things To make us happy

From the sound's that echo forward; to words - once said atlast , the start of silance choosen -that leads us from the past. In written lines before you , countless worlds unfold , and voices turn to whisper as memories unfold. Its not that no one listen's, the things we say ring true, the cards were always holding , mean more to me and you. In moments of true witness and time that should stand still, there's always one thing given.....the choice, your own free will. The mountains that we're climbing , the shadows that we cast, the reasons that we're searching - will come to us at last. In hopes of understanding and thoughts to warm your soul,the one thing to discover.....listen......and you'll know.
